---
title: "How to Create a Post"
format: html
---


Draft the post in the Draft Posts folder


When ready for publication Use distill to create a post


```{r}
# library(distill)
# create_post("Danger! TX HB 4623 Creates Financial Landmine for Texas School Board Trustees")

```


Build website

```{r}
# rmarkdown::render_site()

```

Use the Build Tab in the RStudio IDE to build your website


Use GIT tab to update the repository

Check website to confirm updates to website
